page.title: 01INTRODUCING OUR AREA
page.content: IT IS A NON-RESIDENTIAL AREA WHICH IS GREEN BELT AND CONSISTS OF FAIRLY LEVEL FARMLAND AND YET HAS SEVERAL MAJOR COMPLEXES.THESE BEING,THE RECENTLY DEVELOPED BIRMINGHAM INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT,NATIONAL EXHIBITION CENTRE AND ITS INTERNATIONAL RAILWAY STATION,ELMDON TRADING ESTATE AND THE MOTORCYCLE MUSEUM.THE SUCCESS OF THESE COMPLEXES IS DUE TO EASY ACCESSABILITY THROUGH THE AREAS WELL PLANNED ROAD,RAIL AND AIR NETWORKS.EVEN THOUGH IT IS A NON-RESIDENTIAL AREA A LARGE AMOUNT OF RECREATIONAL FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE. THE N.E.C.PROVIDES SHOWS,CONCERTS AND EXHIBITIONS BUT ALSO ATRACTS BUISNESS. THE NEWLY BUILT MOTORCYCLE MUSEUM PROVIDES AN EDUCATIONAL RECREATION FACILITY.ALSO THERE ARE CERTAIN AREAS LEFT FOR CONSERVATION SUCH AS BICKENHILL PLANTATION.
